wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Evans VC (c. 1821 – 4 October 1901) was a Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

link_mentions.page: List of Scottish Victoria Cross recipients

response: * Samuel Evans (VC) (c. 1821–1901), Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross
* Satyananda Stokes (1882–1946), Samuel Evans Stokes, apple grower and freedom fighter
* Samuel Evans (Texas politician), Texas state representative, 1865–1870 in Eleventh Texas Legislature; Texas state senator, 1870–1874 in Twelfth Texas Legislature
* Samuel Evans (naval officer), commander of USS Hornet and later of Brooklyn Navy Yard
